text: O lyudi Pisaniya! Ne proyavlyayte chrezmernosti v vashey religii i govorite ob Allakhe tol'ko pravdu. Messiya Isa (Iisus), syn Mar'yam (Marii), yavlyayetsya poslannikom Allakha, Yego Slovom, kotoroye On poslal Mar'yam (Marii), i dukhom ot Nego. Veruyte zhe v Allakha i Yego poslannikov i ne govorite: «Troitsa!». Prekratite, ved' tak budet luchshe dlya vas. Voistinu, Allakh yavlyayetsya Yedinstvennym Bogom. On prechist i dalek ot togo, chtoby u Nego byl syn. Yemu prinadlezhit to, chto na nebesakh, i to, chto na zemle. Dovol'no togo, chto Allakh yavlyayetsya Popechitelem i Khranitelem
